txt.en: Defeat Thaguzg in Halls of Crafting
Bashkuga's knowledge of Saruman's Black Fire is too great not to be stolen.
The vile taskmaster Thaguzg leads many Orcs in the Halls of Crafting.
Chieftains of the Halls of Crafting

The Halls of Crafting, once inhabited by the Dwarves of Khazad-dûm in ages past, now boast the finest of Orc-smiths, who serve Mazog. Their work can only be hindered by the defeat of those who command them.
Defeat Âmbal in the Halls of Crafting
Defeat Bashkuga in the Halls of Crafting
Âmbal is the chief of the Orc-smiths responsible for recreating the Black Fire of Saruman.
